Articles.Content: I'm doing the last tutorial (the second part of the Asteroid redirect mission). I'm at the point where I've attached myself to the asteroid, and Gene Kerbin says "Open your map, set Kerbin as your target" etc. How am I supposed to do this if I can't set Kerbin as a target? Is this a mistake in the tutorial, or am I missing something? I'm going to make the maneuver node anyway, but it seems like a problem to me.

Welcome to the forum

Indeed, it is not possible to set Kerbin as your target because Kerbin is actually the body you are orbiting.
I guess this part of the mission description is a leftover from a time, when this tutorial was performed in a solar orbit and in this case, it would be possible to set Kerbin as your target.
You can ignore it and mess around with your new pet astroid however you like, the tutorial basically ends with this step
